name: Whip Jump-Kick Grab
description:
Synopsis

2D fighting game. Each player is prompted at the beginning to choose from three powerful attacks to be performed at the end of round. Each attack is a counter to one of the other three (Rock-Paper-Scissors). Whip beats grab, grab beats jump-kick, and jump-kick beats whip. Once the round begins its an all out brawl, where players may push, kick or block to gain the upper hand over their opponent. Once a players health bar is depleted the winner is decided and the match is over. 

In single player face off against three varying degrees of normal to impossible AI. 

Controls

Player 1:

(w,a,s,d) - Player Movement / cursor movement

(z) -  push / select option

(x) - kick / back

(c) - block

(esc) - go to menu

Player 2:

(up,down,left,right) - Player Movement / cursor movement

(,) -  push / select option

(.) - kick / back

(/) - block
